title: How is Panth Mid a thing???
body: It's ranked and people are playing panth mid and he just dominates there really is no meta anymore guys NONE you cant play any mage against him and a WW jungler there is no frikin way fix league its extremely broken..........

replies.body: Pantheon mid was a thing back in season 3. I love taking him or Kha'zix mid and pub stomping the other mid laner because they almost never know how to play the match up.

Nothing new, panth mid is as old as league and feeds off bad midlaners that try and fight him.

He has the same weakness as panth top - survive his low level harass (any mid mage should have no trouble keeping him at a distance) and wait for him to become useless.

Panth mid always worked.  Heck panth bot works as well in a duo.  You ever landed vs panth and Leona paired bot?  Its pretty darn fun to face check an enemies poke and stun them into the ground as they try to flash to tower just to catch a spear in the back.
